name: Oc-old-menu-stylish
description: Stylish style to bring back old menu in ownCloud
additional_info:
Requirements:
  • ownCloud 7+ (before, it's... useless)
  • Stylish or some other browser addon to deal with UserStyles (obviously)
Behavior: When screen width is larger than 1100px, menu is placed to the left (like old oc menu). Below 1100px, menu is brought back to the top. Further details / instructions: Please see the script repository on Github. Note: This UserStyle was optimized for owncloud 8.2+ and nextcloud 9+. In case you run an owncloud version older than 8.2 for some reason, please use the stylesheet version from 8/2016.
